subtitle: This recipe uses fresh raspberries and store cupboard ingredients.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease a 900 ml ovenproof dish.
Whisk the caster sugar, egg yolks and vanilla together. Slowly whisk in the milk.
Scatter the breadcrumbs into the base of the ovenproof dish. Pour over the milk mixture. Leave to stand for 10 min.
Cook in the oven for 30 min or until set. Leave to cool slightly.
Spread the jam over the cooked base. Scatter over the raspberries.
Whisk the egg whites in a clean bowl until stiff but not dry. Gradually whisk in the remaining caster sugar, a tablespoon at a time, until thick and glossy, reserving one tablespoon of the sugar.
Spoon or pipe the meringue mixture over the raspberries. Sprinkle over the reserved sugar.
Cook in the oven for 15-20 min or until crisp and lightly browned. Serve immediately.

title: Queen of puddings
